person.persName: Robert Loyd (Louisville, Kentucky, brickmason and fireman)

body.p: Louisville, Kentucky, brickmason and fireman. Kentucky native. Married to Maria E. Fox Lloyd in Jefferson County, Kentucky, on September 4, 1853. Father of George W. Loyd, William Loyd, and Rosa Belle Loyd. Brickmason in Lousiville, Kentucky, in 1850. Household owned two enslaved persons in Louisville in 1850. Brickmason in Lousiville in 1860. Fireman in Louisville in 1861.
